Tables for pharmacometrics

## Examples

Continuous covariate summary!

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(pmtables)
library(pmplots)

data <- pmplots_data_id()
```

```{r,results = 'hide'}
pt_cont_study(data, cols = "BMI,ALB,AAG", study_col = vars(Study = STUDYc)) 
```
